name: Sky And Earth
description:
Let's go—beyond this closed sky.

●Story

The "Old World", an era when humankind prospered with the discovery of return energy,
The end was reached by the monsters "Goguma" who suddenly appeared.

Thousands of years after the collapse of civilization, mankind fled to the sky with the sky people
It was divided into the earthlings left behind on earth and survived.

Sky people who enjoy a blessed life in the sky country,
Earthlings forced into an endless battle with Goguma on the ground.
The difference was clear, and it was only natural for them to look down on each other and look down on each other.

One day, an earthling boy, Rikudio, fell from the sky.
The story begins with the picking up of the skyling girl Soraharia.

For some reason, the two traveled together,
With the survival of mankind on the line, he will throw himself into the fight against Goguma.

A boy from the earth and a girl from the sky travel around the world,
A feature-length boy-meets-girl adventure RPG that fights Goguma!

This is a story of innocent intentions.
